a824e14d-abbe-4551-8f48-36cedc5b5b21.description: Earners of this badge have engaged in Sofia University non-credit and non-degree seeking Sofia University Entrepreneurial & Global Leadership program certification by attending online study sessions and completing 10 days of virtual internship training to develop their knowledge and insights before graduating. Earners had undergone leadership exploration and mindful leadership learning in global perspectives with Sofia University faculty and experts from different fields.
a824e14d-abbe-4551-8f48-36cedc5b5b21.name: Innovitive & Global Leadership Program

badge_template_activities.title: Achieved a minimum passing score of 70% on the Sofia UniversityGlobal Leadership & Entrepreneurial Program by engaging and participating in online sessions, finishing learning modules of Silicon Valley innovation and management, media, transpersonal leadership, business ethics, and completing the capstone group project during the virtual internship training program.
Explored the theory and practice of international and intercultural leadership, entrepreneurship, and innovation management.
Identified benefits of intercultural applications to personal life, education, and future business.
Created insights from transpersonal psychology, business ethics, and from design thinking theory.

Networked with guest speakers who are outstanding leaders and professors from Sofia University, University of Minnesota - Twin Cities, Parsons School of Design, San José State University, Imperial College London, University of Cambridge, and supervisor of TRC Robotics and Silicon Valley Entrepreneur, etc.
Gained the opportunity for skill development and a competitive edge in the workplace.

Participated in the Sofia University Global Leadership & Entrepreneurship Program as a virtual internship training experience to practice problem-solving and teamwork skills through tangible, real-world business challenges.
